LanguageData.CutPlantsBeforeBuilding.NoInfoTT: When skipping to mark special trees like the Anima tree, the game will not inform about it
LanguageData.CutPlantsBeforeBuilding.DigUpTT: Instead of cutting, plants will be designated to be dug up if possible
LanguageData.CutPlantsBeforeBuilding.DefaultModeTT: Cut plants-option will be turned on each game start.
LanguageData.CutPlantsBeforeBuilding.SpecialTree: Will not mark {0} for cutting since its a special tree.
LanguageData.CutPlantsBeforeBuilding.OnlyCutters: Blocking plants can only be cut if allowed
LanguageData.CutPlantsBeforeBuilding.OnlyCuttersTT: If enabled, only pawns that has plant cutting will cut down blocking plants
